summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of June 2018. It includes information on account balances, transactions, and outgoing transfers to various entities and individuals.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder for the financial transactions detailed in this document.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfield
persons.context: Steuart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Benedictus Banamtuan
persons.context: Benedictus Banamtuan is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Lilyana Paulus
persons.context: Lilyana Paulus is mentioned as a recipient of an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Milena Mat Ushkina
persons.context: Milena Mat Ushkina is mentioned as a recipient of an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Lee McKenzie
persons.context: Lee McKenzie is mentioned as a recipient of an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein made multiple outgoing money transfers to Benedictus Banamtuan.
Jeffrey Epstein made an outgoing money transfer to Lilyana Paulus.
Jeffrey Epstein made an outgoing money transfer to Milena Mat Ushkina.
Jeffrey Epstein made an outgoing money transfer to Lee McKenzie.

events.title: Account Balance Summary
events.description: The document begins with a summary of the account balance as of June 1, 2018.

events.title: End of Month Account Summary
events.description: The document concludes with the ending balance of the account as of June 30, 2018.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, MI 00802
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's account had a beginning balance of $445,465.38 on June 1, 2018.
The account had an ending balance of $410,352.57 as of June 30, 2018.
Multiple outgoing money transfers were made to various individuals and entities throughout June 2018.
Steuart Oldfield is listed as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
Several transactions involved significant amounts, including a $500,000 transfer on June 15, 2018.
